data.eml:eml: The scarab beetle tribe Pentodontini (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Dynastinae) of Colombia: taxonomy, natural history, and distribution

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article López-García, Margarita M., Gasca-Álvarez, Héctor J., Amat-García, Germán (2015): The scarab beetle tribe Pentodontini (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Dynastinae) of Colombia: taxonomy, natural history, and distribution. Zootaxa 4048 (4): 451-492, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4048.4.1
